name: Morning Routine Item
prompt: Simple, clear icon-style illustration of [ITEM] on white background, friendly style, suitable for visual schedule, minimal details, bright colors
notes: Replace [ITEM] with specific activity like "brushing teeth", "eating breakfast", etc.

name: Transition Activity
prompt: Clean, simple illustration showing [ACTIVITY] for classroom transition, clear and easy to understand, suitable for children, minimal background
notes: For activities like "line up", "sit down", "clean up"

name: Emotion Face - Basic
prompt: Simple, friendly cartoon face showing [EMOTION], clear facial expression, suitable for teaching emotions to children, clean white background, gentle style
notes: Replace [EMOTION] with: happy, sad, angry, scared, surprised, etc.

name: Emotion with Intensity
prompt: Thermometer-style emotion scale showing [EMOTION] from calm to intense, simple cartoon faces at each level, easy to understand, labeled with numbers 1-5
notes: Helps children identify emotion intensity levels

name: Social Story Character
prompt: Friendly, simple cartoon character [DOING ACTION], suitable for social story, clear and encouraging, minimal background, appropriate for children
notes: For sequential social stories. Keep character style consistent.

name: Social Situation Scene
prompt: Simple illustration of [SOCIAL SITUATION] with diverse friendly children, showing appropriate behavior, clear and positive, suitable for teaching social skills
notes: Examples: sharing toys, taking turns, asking for help, joining play

name: Learning Concept
prompt: Clear, simple educational illustration showing [CONCEPT], easy to understand, suitable for children, uncluttered, bright and engaging
notes: For teaching concepts like colors, shapes, numbers, letters

name: Science Diagram
prompt: Educational diagram showing [TOPIC], labeled parts with arrows, simple and clear style, colorful, suitable for elementary students, easy to read labels
notes: Examples: parts of a plant, water cycle, human body systems, solar system

name: Science Experiment Visual
prompt: Simple step-by-step illustration of [EXPERIMENT], clear numbered steps, safe and appropriate for children, bright colors, easy to follow
notes: For demonstrating simple science experiments in classroom

name: Math Number Visual
prompt: Clear illustration showing the number [NUMBER] with counting objects, bright and engaging, objects grouped clearly, suitable for teaching counting
notes: Replace [NUMBER] with 1-20. Objects can be fruits, animals, toys, etc.

name: Math Shapes Poster
prompt: Educational poster showing [SHAPE] with real-world examples, labeled clearly, colorful and engaging, suitable for classroom display
notes: Shapes: circle, square, triangle, rectangle, etc. Include everyday objects

name: Math Operation Visual
prompt: Simple visual showing [OPERATION] with objects, clear and easy to understand, bright colors, suitable for teaching basic math concepts
notes: Operations: addition, subtraction, multiplication, division with visual aids

name: Letter Practice Card
prompt: Large letter [LETTER] with pictures of objects starting with that letter, clear and colorful, simple style, white background, suitable for phonics teaching
notes: Both uppercase and lowercase. Include 3-4 objects per letter

name: Sight Word Visual
prompt: Flashcard showing the word [WORD] in large, clear letters with a simple supporting illustration, bright and engaging, easy to read font
notes: For common sight words. Keep illustration simple and relevant

name: Vocabulary Picture Card
prompt: Clear illustration of [WORD] with the word labeled below, simple and uncluttered, bright colors, suitable for vocabulary building
notes: For building vocabulary with visual associations

name: Reward Star/Badge
prompt: Colorful reward badge or star with [TEXT], encouraging and positive, bright colors, celebratory style, suitable for classroom rewards
notes: Examples: "Great Job!", "Super Star!", "Excellent Work!", "You Did It!"

name: Achievement Certificate
prompt: Friendly certificate design for [ACHIEVEMENT], decorative border, space for name, encouraging and celebratory, colorful and positive
notes: For recognizing specific achievements and milestones

name: Calming Strategy Visual
prompt: Simple, calming illustration demonstrating [STRATEGY], peaceful colors, clear step-by-step if needed, friendly and reassuring style
notes: Examples: deep breathing, counting to 10, safe space, mindfulness exercises

name: Feelings Thermometer
prompt: Visual thermometer showing different feeling levels from calm to overwhelmed, simple faces at each level, color-coded, easy to understand
notes: Helps children identify and communicate their emotional state

name: Life Skills Step-by-Step
prompt: Step-by-step visual guide for [SKILL], numbered clear steps, simple illustrations, encouraging style, easy to follow sequence
notes: Examples: handwashing, tying shoes, packing backpack, getting dressed

name: Safety Rule Visual
prompt: Clear illustration showing [SAFETY RULE], positive and instructive, easy to understand, suitable for classroom display, friendly style
notes: Examples: walking feet, gentle hands, inside voices, safe playground behavior

name: Classroom Rule Poster
prompt: Positive classroom rule poster showing [RULE], encouraging and clear, bright colors, simple illustration of children following the rule
notes: Frame rules positively (what TO do, not what NOT to do)

name: Weather Chart Icon
prompt: Clear, simple icon showing [WEATHER], suitable for weather chart, bold and easy to identify, consistent style, bright colors
notes: Weather types: sunny, cloudy, rainy, snowy, windy, stormy, etc.

name: Days of Week Card
prompt: Visual card for [DAY], clear text with supporting illustration, bright and engaging, suitable for classroom calendar
notes: Include both the day name and a memorable visual association

name: Season Illustration
prompt: Beautiful scene depicting [SEASON], clear seasonal indicators, appropriate weather and activities, engaging and educational, suitable for children
notes: Seasons: spring, summer, fall, winter with typical characteristics

name: Sensory Activity Visual
prompt: Engaging illustration of [SENSORY ACTIVITY], clear and inviting, shows materials and action, safe and appropriate, colorful
notes: Examples: playdough, water play, sand table, sensory bins, texture exploration

name: Choice Board Item
prompt: Simple, clear illustration of [CHOICE] for choice board, icon style, easy to identify, suitable for classroom, white background
notes: For choice boards showing activity options

name: First-Then Board Visual
prompt: Two-part visual showing FIRST [TASK] THEN [REWARD], clear sequence with arrows, simple and motivating, easy to understand
notes: Helps with task completion and transitions. Keep very simple and clear

name: Inclusive Character - Diverse
prompt: Friendly, diverse character illustration showing [CHARACTERISTIC], inclusive representation, warm and welcoming, appropriate for educational materials
notes: Create diverse, inclusive representations of children and families

name: Helpful Adult Figure
prompt: Friendly illustration of [HELPER] in simple, approachable style, diverse representation, kind expression, suitable for teaching about community helpers
notes: Examples: teacher, doctor, firefighter, police officer, librarian, crossing guard

name: Bulletin Board Background
prompt: Colorful, engaging bulletin board background with [THEME], decorative border, space for content in center, bright and cheerful, classroom appropriate
notes: Themes: space, ocean, jungle, seasons, books, stars. Use wide format for bulletin boards

name: Classroom Job Chart Header
prompt: Fun header design for [JOB] classroom helper role, clear title, decorative icons, bright colors, professional yet playful
notes: Jobs: line leader, door holder, paper passer, weather reporter, librarian, plant waterer

name: Welcome Sign/Door Display
prompt: Welcoming classroom door sign with text [MESSAGE], decorative and inviting, colorful design, appropriate for elementary classroom, friendly style
notes: Messages: 'Welcome to Our Class', 'Come On In!', 'We're Glad You're Here'

name: Motivational Classroom Poster
prompt: Inspiring classroom poster with motivational quote about [THEME], encouraging design, bright colors, child-friendly imagery, suitable for classroom wall
notes: Themes: growth mindset, kindness, perseverance, teamwork, reading, learning

name: Classroom Label/Tag
prompt: Clear, colorful label for [ITEM], text space with decorative border, organized and professional, suitable for classroom organization
notes: Labels for: supplies, cubbies, bins, shelves, centers, materials. Keep text area clear

name: Word Wall Header
prompt: Decorative header for word wall showing letter [LETTER], large clear letter with themed decoration, bright colors, professional classroom display
notes: Create consistent style across all 26 letters for complete word wall

name: Birthday Display Element
prompt: Festive birthday display piece showing [MONTH], celebratory design, space for student names, colorful and fun, classroom appropriate
notes: Create one for each month with seasonal or themed decorations

name: Book Character - Watercolor
prompt: Children's book character [DESCRIPTION] in soft watercolor style, gentle colors, expressive face, full body, white background, storybook illustration quality
notes: Watercolor creates dreamy, classic storybook feel. Best for gentle, emotional stories

name: Book Character - Digital Cartoon
prompt: Adorable cartoon character [DESCRIPTION], bold colors, simple shapes, expressive features, dynamic pose, clean digital illustration, children's book style
notes: Modern, vibrant style. Great for energetic, fun stories. Easy to reproduce consistently

name: Book Character - Whimsical
prompt: Whimsical, magical character [DESCRIPTION], fantastical details, enchanting style, soft lighting, imaginative design, fairy tale book illustration
notes: Perfect for fantasy and magical stories. Dreamy, imaginative feel

name: Animal Character Design
prompt: Friendly anthropomorphic [ANIMAL] character wearing [CLOTHING], expressive personality, charming details, children's book illustration, full body view, white background
notes: Animals: rabbit, bear, fox, mouse, owl, etc. Add human traits for relatability

name: Diverse Child Character
prompt: Diverse child character [DESCRIPTION], inclusive representation, warm expression, age-appropriate clothing, relatable and friendly, children's book illustration style
notes: Create characters kids can relate to and see themselves in

name: Family/Group Character
prompt: Diverse family group showing [DESCRIPTION], warm interaction, varied ages, inclusive representation, storybook illustration style, emotional connection
notes: Include various family structures. Use wide format for group scenes

name: Home Interior Scene
prompt: Cozy children's book illustration of [ROOM] interior, warm lighting, inviting atmosphere, simple furniture, space for characters, detailed but not cluttered
notes: Rooms: bedroom, kitchen, living room, playroom. Create familiar, comfortable settings

name: Outdoor Nature Scene
prompt: Beautiful children's book illustration of [OUTDOOR LOCATION], soft natural lighting, inviting landscape, space for characters, gentle colors, storybook quality
notes: Locations: forest, park, garden, meadow, beach, mountains. Wide format for landscapes

name: School/Classroom Scene
prompt: Warm, welcoming classroom interior, children's book illustration style, colorful and organized, educational elements, space for characters, friendly atmosphere
notes: Include desks, books, learning materials. Make it feel inviting and safe

name: Fantasy/Magical Scene
prompt: Enchanting fantasy landscape showing [DESCRIPTION], magical lighting, whimsical details, dreamy atmosphere, children's storybook illustration, space for characters
notes: Settings: enchanted forest, castle, magical kingdom, fairy village, cloud city

name: Seasonal Background
prompt: Children's book illustration background showing [SEASON], appropriate weather and nature, soft colors, simple composition, space for characters and text
notes: Create consistent backgrounds for different seasons in your story

name: Night/Evening Scene
prompt: Peaceful nighttime scene showing [LOCATION] under starry sky, soft moonlight, calming colors, children's book illustration, magical evening atmosphere
notes: Perfect for bedtime stories. Use gentle, soothing colors

name: City/Town Scene
prompt: Friendly neighborhood scene showing [DESCRIPTION], charming buildings, welcoming streets, children's book illustration style, community atmosphere
notes: Settings: main street, neighborhood, playground, park, shops. Show community

name: Watercolor Illustration Style
prompt: Soft watercolor children's book illustration of [SUBJECT], gentle blended colors, artistic brushstrokes, dreamy quality, emotional and expressive, traditional storybook feel
notes: Classic, timeless look. Great for emotional, gentle stories

name: Bold Digital Cartoon
prompt: Modern digital cartoon illustration of [SUBJECT], bold outlines, vibrant colors, clean shapes, energetic and fun, contemporary children's book style
notes: Modern, eye-catching. Perfect for active, humorous stories

name: Hand-Drawn Sketch Style
prompt: Charming hand-drawn sketch illustration of [SUBJECT], pencil-like texture, warm and personal feel, children's book style, authentic artistic quality
notes: Personal, warm feel. Great for intimate, heartfelt stories

name: Minimalist/Modern Style
prompt: Clean minimalist children's book illustration of [SUBJECT], simple shapes, limited color palette, modern design, uncluttered and elegant, contemporary style
notes: Modern, sophisticated. Great for concept books and design-focused stories

name: Vintage Storybook Style
prompt: Classic vintage storybook illustration of [SUBJECT], nostalgic colors, traditional techniques, timeless quality, golden age children's book style
notes: Timeless, nostalgic feel. Perfect for classic fairy tales and traditional stories

name: Collage/Textured Style
prompt: Textured collage-style children's book illustration of [SUBJECT], layered paper effect, rich textures, artistic and tactile, unique visual style
notes: Unique, artistic look. Great for creative, imaginative stories

name: Realistic but Kid-Friendly
prompt: Semi-realistic children's book illustration of [SUBJECT], detailed but soft, gentle realism, warm colors, approachable and friendly, high-quality illustration
notes: Realistic but not scary. Great for educational or nature books

name: Core Vocabulary Symbol
prompt: Clear, simple symbol showing [WORD], AAC-style icon, high contrast, easy to understand, suitable for communication board, white background, bold and recognizable
notes: Core words: I, want, go, stop, more, help, yes, no, eat, drink, play, etc.

name: PECS-Style Communication Card
prompt: Simple PECS-style card showing [ITEM/ACTION], clear photograph-like quality, minimal background, easy to identify, suitable for communication exchange
notes: For Picture Exchange Communication System. Keep simple and realistic

name: Communication Board Layout
prompt: Multi-cell communication board for [TOPIC], organized grid of simple symbols, clear labels, high contrast, professional AAC design, easy to scan visually
notes: Topics: mealtime, playtime, feelings, requests. Use wide format for full board

name: Tracing Practice Sheet
prompt: Practice sheet for tracing [SHAPE/LETTER/NUMBER], dotted lines to follow, age-appropriate difficulty, clear starting points, engaging design
notes: For developing pencil control and pre-writing skills

name: Cutting Practice Lines
prompt: Scissor practice sheet with [TYPE] lines to cut, progressive difficulty, fun theme, clear bold lines, appropriate for developing cutting skills
notes: Types: straight, curved, zigzag, spiral. Add fun elements like cutting paths to treasures

name: Lacing/Threading Card
prompt: Lacing card design showing [SHAPE/OBJECT], evenly spaced holes around edge, simple design, suitable for cutting out and laminating, engaging theme
notes: Builds hand-eye coordination and concentration. Use shapes or simple objects kids love

name: Movement Activity Card
prompt: Action card showing [MOVEMENT ACTIVITY], clear demonstration of movement, engaging illustration of child performing action, easy to understand and copy
notes: Activities: jump, hop, skip, balance, stretch, twist, march, crawl, etc.

name: Yoga Pose for Kids
prompt: Child-friendly yoga pose illustration showing [POSE NAME], clear body position, calming colors, easy to follow, includes pose name, suitable for classroom yoga
notes: Poses: tree, cat, cow, downward dog, cobra, child's pose. Use animal names kids relate to

name: Body Part Movement Chart
prompt: Body awareness chart focusing on [BODY PART], simple movements highlighting that body part, clear arrows and instructions, engaging illustrations
notes: Helps with body awareness and motor planning. Focus on: arms, legs, head, hands, feet, etc.

name: Song Card with Motions
prompt: Visual for song [SONG NAME] showing key motions, sequence of movements, musical notes, fun and engaging, suitable for teaching action songs
notes: Popular songs: Head Shoulders Knees and Toes, If You're Happy, Hokey Pokey, etc.

name: Musical Instrument Card
prompt: Clear illustration of [INSTRUMENT], simple and colorful, shows how it's played, labeled clearly, suitable for music education
notes: Instruments: drums, shakers, bells, xylophone, tambourine, triangle, recorder, etc.

name: Rhythm Pattern Visual
prompt: Visual rhythm pattern showing [PATTERN], colorful symbols representing beats, easy to follow, suitable for teaching basic rhythm concepts
notes: Use shapes or colors to represent different note values. Keep simple and clear

name: Visual Recipe Card
prompt: Step-by-step visual recipe for [SIMPLE RECIPE], numbered steps with pictures, clear instructions, safe and age-appropriate, engaging layout
notes: No-cook recipes: sandwich, fruit salad, trail mix, smoothie. Focus on independence and safety

name: Food Group Category
prompt: Educational poster showing [FOOD GROUP], variety of foods from that group, colorful and appetizing, labeled clearly, suitable for nutrition education
notes: Groups: fruits, vegetables, grains, protein, dairy. Show diverse, appealing foods

name: Kitchen Safety Rule
prompt: Clear illustration of kitchen safety rule: [RULE], positive instruction, shows safe behavior, easy to understand, appropriate for teaching cooking safety
notes: Rules: wash hands, use oven mitts, adult help with sharp/hot, clean as you go

name: Community Helper Portrait
prompt: Friendly illustration of [COMMUNITY HELPER] with tools/uniform, diverse representation, approachable expression, simple background, educational style
notes: Helpers: mail carrier, bus driver, librarian, dentist, veterinarian, cashier, etc.

name: Community Location
prompt: Simple exterior view of [LOCATION], friendly and welcoming, clear signage, easy to identify, suitable for community exploration lessons
notes: Places: library, post office, grocery store, fire station, hospital, bank, park, school

name: Simple Map Visual
prompt: Child-friendly map showing [AREA], simplified street layout, key landmarks illustrated, colorful and clear, suitable for teaching basic map skills
notes: Maps: classroom, school, neighborhood, simple town. Use symbols and pictures, not just text

name: Animal Fact Card
prompt: Educational card featuring [ANIMAL], realistic but friendly appearance, includes key facts, habitat information, appealing to children, suitable for nature study
notes: Include: what they eat, where they live, interesting fact. Make animals non-threatening

name: Animal Habitat Scene
prompt: Beautiful scene showing [HABITAT] with appropriate animals, natural environment, educational and engaging, labeled elements, suitable for learning about ecosystems
notes: Habitats: forest, ocean, desert, jungle, arctic, savanna, wetland, pond

name: Plant Life Cycle
prompt: Clear diagram showing life cycle of [PLANT], stages labeled with arrows, simple and educational, colorful illustrations, easy to understand sequence
notes: Plants: flower, tree, vegetable. Show seed, sprout, growth, mature, reproduction stages

name: Computer Skills Visual
prompt: Step-by-step guide for [COMPUTER TASK], clear screenshots or illustrations, simple instructions, appropriate for teaching basic computer skills
notes: Tasks: mouse use, keyboard basics, login process, save file, open program, use search

name: Digital Safety Rule
prompt: Clear illustration of online safety rule: [RULE], positive and protective, easy to understand, suitable for teaching internet safety to children
notes: Rules: keep passwords private, ask adult permission, kind online behavior, stranger danger

name: Typing Practice Guide
prompt: Keyboard layout showing [HAND POSITION/KEYS], color-coded fingers, home row highlighted, clear and educational, suitable for beginning typing instruction
notes: Show proper finger placement and hand position. Use colors to help with finger assignments

name: Handwashing Steps
prompt: Step-by-step handwashing guide, numbered clear steps, shows proper technique, engaging illustrations, includes timing reminder, classroom appropriate
notes: Include all 6-8 steps: wet, soap, scrub 20 seconds, rinse, dry. Make it fun and memorable

name: Tooth Brushing Visual
prompt: Tooth brushing instruction showing [STEP/TECHNIQUE], clear demonstration, friendly tooth character, proper technique shown, suitable for dental health education
notes: Show: brush all surfaces, use circular motions, brush for 2 minutes, rinse. Keep positive and encouraging

name: Healthy Habits Poster
prompt: Positive poster promoting [HEALTHY HABIT], colorful and encouraging, shows benefits, age-appropriate message, motivating design for classroom display
notes: Habits: sleep, exercise, fruits/vegetables, water, hygiene. Frame positively, not scary

name: Coin Identification Card
prompt: Clear illustration of [COIN], both sides shown, value labeled, relative size accurate, simple background, suitable for teaching money recognition
notes: Coins: penny, nickel, dime, quarter, dollar. Include cent symbol and name

name: Bill Identification Card
prompt: Educational card showing [$X bill], clear front view, value prominently displayed, suitable for teaching paper money recognition, realistic but simplified
notes: Bills: $1, $5, $10, $20. Focus on denomination number and basic features

name: Shopping Scenario
prompt: Simple shopping scene showing [SCENARIO], price tags visible, appropriate money exchange, friendly cashier, suitable for teaching shopping skills and money use
notes: Scenarios: buying snack, paying for item, receiving change. Include prices in simple amounts

name: Clock Reading - Analog
prompt: Clear clock face showing [TIME], large numbers, distinct hour and minute hands, labeled hands, simple and easy to read, suitable for teaching time
notes: Start with o'clock times, then half hours, then quarter hours, then 5-minute intervals

name: Daily Schedule Timeline
prompt: Visual timeline of daily events showing times for [DAY TYPE], clocks at each major event, activities illustrated, clear sequence, suitable for time management teaching
notes: Day types: school day, weekend day. Show breakfast, school, lunch, homework, dinner, bedtime

name: Time Duration Visual
prompt: Visual representation of [TIME DURATION], shows elapsed time concept, before and after clocks, engaging illustration, suitable for teaching time passage
notes: Durations: 5 minutes, 15 minutes, 30 minutes, 1 hour. Use relatable activities to show duration

name: Vehicle Identification Card
prompt: Clear illustration of [VEHICLE], simple side view, bold colors, labeled clearly, suitable for transportation unit, engaging for children
notes: Vehicles: car, bus, train, airplane, boat, bicycle, truck, ambulance, fire truck, police car

name: Transportation Safety Rule
prompt: Clear illustration of transportation safety rule: [RULE], shows safe behavior, positive instruction, appropriate for teaching vehicle and road safety
notes: Rules: wear seatbelt, hold handrail on bus, look both ways, stay seated, follow bus driver, wait for complete stop

name: Traffic Sign Education
prompt: Educational card showing [TRAFFIC SIGN], clear symbol, meaning explained simply, color accurate, suitable for pedestrian and basic road safety
notes: Signs: stop, walk/don't walk, crosswalk, school zone, bike lane, yield, railroad crossing

name: Zones of Regulation Visual
prompt: Clear zones chart showing [ZONE COLOR], associated feelings and energy level, body cues, simple faces, suitable for self-regulation teaching using zones framework
notes: Zones: Blue (sad/tired), Green (happy/focused), Yellow (frustrated/silly), Red (angry/scared). Include physical sensations

name: Zone Tool/Strategy
prompt: Visual showing regulation strategy for [ZONE], clear demonstration of technique, appropriate tool or activity, labeled with zone color, helpful and calming design
notes: Blue zone: energizing activities; Green zone: maintaining tools; Yellow zone: calming strategies; Red zone: intense calming

name: Size of Problem Visual
prompt: Chart showing problem sizes with [EXAMPLES], small/medium/big problems illustrated, matching reactions, helps with perspective and emotional regulation
notes: Small: dropped pencil, tag itches; Medium: forgot homework, friend busy; Big: injury, emergency. Show proportional reactions

name: Organization System Visual
prompt: Clear visual system for organizing [TASK/MATERIALS], labeled sections, color-coded if helpful, practical and easy to implement, suitable for improving organization skills
notes: Systems: backpack organization, desk setup, homework folders, morning routine checklist

name: Task Planning Visual
prompt: Step-by-step planning guide for [TASK TYPE], breaks task into chunks, includes timing estimate, checkboxes, suitable for teaching task initiation and completion
notes: Tasks: completing project, multi-step homework, cleaning room, preparing for outing

name: Time Management Tool
prompt: Visual timer or schedule showing [TIME MANAGEMENT CONCEPT], clear time blocks, activity breakdown, suitable for helping with time awareness and planning
notes: Concepts: homework time blocks, morning routine timing, study session planning, break schedules

name: Problem-Solving Steps
prompt: Clear step-by-step problem-solving process, numbered steps with visuals, easy to follow sequence, suitable for teaching systematic problem-solving approach
notes: Steps: 1) What's the problem? 2) What are solutions? 3) Pick best one 4) Try it 5) Did it work?

name: Decision Making Visual
prompt: Decision-making chart for [SCENARIO], shows options and outcomes, helps weigh choices, clear pros and cons, suitable for teaching decision-making skills
notes: Scenarios: what to play, how to handle conflict, choosing activity, solving friendship problem

name: Critical Thinking Puzzle
prompt: Visual thinking puzzle or brain teaser about [TOPIC], age-appropriate challenge, engaging illustration, promotes logical thinking and analysis
notes: Types: pattern completion, categorization, cause-effect, sequencing, what's different, prediction

name: Conversation Starter Cards
prompt: Conversation topic card about [TOPIC], includes sample questions or comments, engaging illustration, suitable for teaching conversational skills
notes: Topics: hobbies, favorites, school, pets, family, weekend, books/movies, games. Keep age-appropriate

name: Friendship Skill Visual
prompt: Clear illustration demonstrating [FRIENDSHIP SKILL], positive interaction between children, diverse characters, shows desirable social behavior, encouraging style
notes: Skills: sharing, taking turns, listening, including others, giving compliments, showing empathy, being a good sport

name: Conflict Resolution Steps
prompt: Step-by-step guide for resolving [CONFLICT TYPE], peaceful problem-solving approach, shows children working together, positive resolution, age-appropriate strategies
notes: Conflicts: toy disputes, game disagreements, hurt feelings, misunderstandings. Emphasize talking, listening, compromising
